content.body: thoughts on https://github.com/tc39/test262/pull/3443 ? I think this is a good test, and it is good to have this sort of thing covered, but it seems to me that this falls under "regression tests" which we're discussing in Mike's rationales document (https://github.com/tc39/test262/pull/3423/files#diff-21661bf16a5bc633cd2583a093e02716b600e494fc741c5e52291b014d051a44R104) and I'm not sure where others would draw the line. so a quick temperature check seems in order
